bulbasaur.name: bulbasaur
bulbasaur.description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this Pokémon.

1.name: bulbasaur
1.description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this Pokémon.

ivysaur.name: ivysaur
ivysaur.description: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

2.name: ivysaur
2.description: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

venusaur.name: venusaur
venusaur.description: The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

3.name: venusaur
3.description: The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

charmander.name: charmander
charmander.description: Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

4.name: charmander
4.description: Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

charmeleon.name: charmeleon
charmeleon.description: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.

5.description: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.

charizard.name: charizard
charizard.description: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.

6.name: charizard
6.description: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.

squirtle.name: squirtle

7.name: squirtle
7.description: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. Powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.

wartortle.name: wartortle

8.name: wartortle
8.description: Often hides in water to stalk unwary prey. For swimming fast, it moves its ears to maintain balance.

blastoise.name: blastoise

9.name: blastoise
9.description: A brutal Pokémon with pressurized water jets on its shell. They are used for high speed tackles.

caterpie.name: caterpie
caterpie.description: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.

metapod.name: metapod

11.description: This Pokémon is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.

butterfree.name: butterfree

weedle.name: weedle

kakuna.name: kakuna

15.name: beedrill
15.description: Flies at high speed and attacks using its large venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.

16.name: pidgey

pidgeot.name: pidgeot

20.name: raticate
20.description: It uses its whiskers to maintain its balance. It apparently slows down if they are cut off.

23.description: Moves silently and stealthily. Eats the eggs of birds, such as PIDGEY and SPEAROW, whole.

28.description: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.

33.description: An aggressive Pokémon that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.

36.name: clefable

39.description: When its huge eyes light up, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.

45.description: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.
